assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Money Forward, Inc. provides money-related services for individuals and corporations. It offers Money Forward ME, an automatic household account book service; MONEY PLUS that enriches people's lives by communicating about money; Money Forward Personal Financial Consulting and Sensei, a money management service that provides advice to save and optimize their household budget; Money Forward Career, a recruiter-and-candidate matching service; Money Forward Fixed Cost Review, a service that helps individuals improve their finances; and Money Forward Furusato Tax Donation, a hometown tax donation website that offers a wide variety of tax returns. The company also provides Money Forward Cloud, a SaaS for businesses which automates and streamlines accounting and human resource operations; Money Forward Cloud Accounting, a cloud based accounting software; Money Forward Cloud Accounting Plus; Money Forward Cloud Tax Return; Money Forward Cloud Invoice Issuing; Money Forward Cloud Invoice Issuing Plus; Money Forward Cloud Expense; Money Forward Cloud Payable Management; Money Forward Cloud Invoice System; Money Forward Cloud Fixed Assets; and Money Forward Cloud Box solutons. In addition, it offers Money Forward Cloud HR Database; MoneyForward Cloud Attendance; Money Forward Cloud Payroll; Money Forward Cloud Tax Adjustment; MoneyForward Cloud Social Insurance; Money Forward Cloud My Number; Money Forward Cloud Contract; and Money Forward Cloud Company Registration. Further, the company provides STREAMED; Manageboard; HiTTO; Money Forward IT Management Cloud; BALES; BALES CLOUD; BOXIL; and ADXL. Additionally, it offers Money Forward Kessai, Money Forward Early Payment, SEIKYU+, SHIKIN+, HIRAC FUND, and Money Forward Transaction Finance for Startups. The company was formerly known as Moneybook Co. and changed its name to Money Forward, Inc. in December 2012. Money Forward, Inc. was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
